bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: SyntaxError is raised when harvester is imported.
bug.description:
Describe the bug SyntaxError is raised when harvester is imported. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Import harvester in a script. Run the script. You'll see the following traceback.
Traceback (most recent call last): File "harvester_test.py", line 2, in <module> from harvesters.core import Harvester File "python-3.5.4-embed-amd64\lib\site-packages\harvesters\core.py", line 1239 ): ^ SyntaxError: invalid syntax Expected behavior Any exceptin must not be raised while harvester is being imported. Additional context None.

comments.comment: The bug has been introduced at 0.2.3.
